segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water overflowing and spilling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn't seem to feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge, creating a real mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink is open, letting in a nice breeze.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks so calm and tidy, unlike the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices the water soon before it causes any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so focused on her task, oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR
